resources.string: By clicking on the button, you indicate your consent to abide\n by our terms and conditions as well as our\n privacy policy.
Please provide us with your email address to initiate the password recovery process.
Dear developers, in order to continue using the app, please sign in to the application.

CodeKosh is a platform for sharing projects related to development tools like Sketchware, Sketchware Pro, Android Studio, AIDE, and web development and others too. It has a sleek Material 3-based UI design, is network-efficient, and includes a Queries feature that allows users to ask questions and collaborate with other developers. Developed in India, the app helps developers worldwide to showcase their work, connect with others in the community, and learn new skills.

- Young self-taught coder.
- Works in Java/Kotlin.
- 17 years old.
- Founder and developer CodeKosh.
- Learns new programming languages.
- 97% developed CodeKosh

Apply for Moderator or Beta tester

If you want to become a moderator or beta tester for our app, fill out our form. Moderators help keep our community safe, while beta testers get to try out new features and provide feedback. We\'ll review your application and get back to you soon. Thanks for your interest!

Dear User,

 We would like to inform you that you have the opportunity to apply for a verification badge for your account at no cost, provided you meet the basic eligibility criteria. Our team will carefully review your past activities and account details during the verification process. If everything aligns with our standards, you will be granted the verification badge.

The eligibility criteria for the verification badge are as follows:

*bâ€¢*bMinimum of 10 projects completed successfully.
*bâ€¢*bPresence of more than 200 likes on your account.
*bâ€¢*bAbsence of any negative past activities associated with your account.
*bâ€¢*bNo history of account suspension or bans.
*bâ€¢*bConsistent adherence to our user policies and guidelines.

We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

 Thank you for your attention.

 Sincerely,

 CodeKosh's Team
